trans-unit.source: Formación en ciberseguridad ofensiva actualmente en curso. Enfoque práctico orientado a entornos reales. Estudio de redes y protocolos de comunicación. Uso de Linux y Bash aplicado a seguridad. Administración y seguridad en sistemas Windows. Hacking ético en entornos controlados. Análisis OSINT para recolección de información. Ingeniería social desde enfoque defensivo. Explotación de vulnerabilidades en aplicaciones. Introducción a Bug Bounty. Fundamentos de seguridad en entornos cloud. Aprendizaje continuo mediante laboratorios prácticos.
trans-unit.target: Offensive cybersecurity training currently in progress. Practical approach focused on real-world environments. Study of networks and communication protocols. Use of Linux and Bash applied to security. Administration and security of Windows systems. Ethical hacking in controlled environments. OSINT analysis for information gathering. Social engineering from a defensive perspective. Exploitation of application vulnerabilities. Introduction to Bug Bounty. Fundamentals of cloud security. Continuous learning through hands-on labs.

trans-unit.source: Aprendí Java, Kotlin, Android Studio, Python y Docker, junto con otras herramientas, desarrollando habilidades para crear aplicaciones móviles y de escritorio, gestionar entornos de desarrollo y adaptar soluciones a distintos requisitos y plataformas.
trans-unit.target: I learned Java, Kotlin, Android Studio, Python and Docker, along with other tools, developing skills to create mobile and desktop applications, manage development environments and adapt solutions to different requirements and platforms.

trans-unit.source: Aprendí Git, SQL, JavaScript, PHP, HTML y CSS, entre otras tecnologías, adquiriendo conocimientos tanto en el diseño y la estructura de aplicaciones como en la programación y el control de versiones.
trans-unit.target: I learned Git, SQL, JavaScript, PHP, HTML and CSS, among other technologies, gaining knowledge in both application design and structure, as well as programming and version control.

trans-unit.source: Desarrollé aplicaciones con Spring Boot y JavaScript, diseñando APIs REST y trabajando con metodologías ágiles.
trans-unit.target: I developed applications using Spring Boot and JavaScript, designing REST APIs and working with agile methodologies.

trans-unit.source: Creé un plugin de WordPress orientado a seguridad y shortcodes, y personalicé sitios con Elementor.
trans-unit.target: I created a WordPress plugin focused on security and shortcodes, and customized websites using Elementor.

trans-unit.source: Soy desarrollador de software con experiencia en Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, SQL y Python. Me gusta enfrentarme a nuevos retos y aprender constantemente.
trans-unit.target: I am a software developer with experience in Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, SQL, and Python. I enjoy facing new challenges and learning constantly, whether exploring new technologies or deepening my knowledge of existing ones. I also have experience working with tools like Git and Jira, which has helped me perform well in collaborative teams and agile environments.

trans-unit.source: He trabajado como Desarrollador Full Stack en Kimau y Baleària.
trans-unit.target: I have worked as a Full Stack Developer at Kimau and Baleària. At Kimau, I developed a WordPress plugin and customized pages using Elementor while applying clean code principles. At Baleària, I built applications with Spring Boot and JavaScript, designed REST APIs, and worked with agile methodologies using Jira and GitLab, resolving issues and improving functionalities.

trans-unit.source: En la formación en ciberseguridad ofensiva, actualmente en curso...
trans-unit.target: In the offensive cybersecurity training program, currently in progress, I am gaining hands-on experience focused on real-world environments, studying networks and communication protocols, using Linux and Bash for security purposes, and managing and securing Windows systems. Additionally, I work with ethical hacking in controlled environments, OSINT analysis, social engineering from a defensive perspective, vulnerability exploitation in applications, Bug Bounty fundamentals, and security foundations in cloud environments, reinforcing continuous learning through practical labs.

trans-unit.source: En el ciclo de Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Multiplataforma trabajé con Java...
trans-unit.target: In the Multiplatform Application Development program, I worked with Java, Kotlin, Android Studio, Python, and Docker, developing both mobile and desktop applications. This learning experience helped me understand different environments, use containers, and apply best practices to create solutions adapted to multiple platforms.

trans-unit.source: En el ciclo de Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Web reforcé mis conocimientos...
trans-unit.target: In the Web Application Development program, I strengthened my knowledge of Git, SQL, JavaScript, PHP, HTML, and CSS by developing complete projects that combined backend, frontend, and version control. This training enabled me to create functional, well-structured, and optimized web applications.
